long_description: With a wide brim, soft texture and added sun protection, the women's Garden Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with style you can take anywhere. Soft cotton fabric blend is naturally lightweight and breathable; hat packs down for easy packing and travel. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Sunday Afternoons Garden Hat features a 3 in. brim.
short_description: With a wide brim, soft texture and added sun protection, the women's Garden Hat from Sunday Afternoons keeps your skin shaded with style you can take anywhere.
